comments.body: Does this sha get replaced automatically by the bot that watches pypi releases? Or does it also need to be a template variable?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +9,13 @@source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/Fileseq-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 7826047e77f4a679479a3bc90975386e1c8a879f6a43624c09a8d1ffd0fea9fa

build:
